Unfortunately I severely doubt they'd be willing to do that.  Like, I can pretty much guarantee that they won't.

If you don't know, the traditional skins (like Trundle and Karma) sometimes get made during the transition of a major champion rework.  Since these champions had a large and vocal following prior to the rework, Riot was kind enough to keep the spirit of their pre-update forms intact for those who hold them near and dear to our hearts.

That's why these skins aren't available to the public- they want to move forward with their new vision for the champion, but let people who played and loved the old versions hold onto a piece of that nostalgia.
mystery gift. it is a legacy skin so it can be brought back when riot seems fit, but for now none of the traditional skins have been brought back to the store yet!

Yeah, those skins are Legacy and can only be gotten from Mystery Gifts at the moment.  Unless Riot feels like releasing to the store again for one reason or another.
